   TFC DEP EGKK may join the ALESO1H STAR at BIG

   TFC DEP EGBB/BE/NX which may join  HON1H STAR at WEZKO

   EGKK: When using a EGKK STAR the use of  STAR initial waypoint is mand exc for:
   TFC via SITET which may join SIRIC1G STAR at MID 
TFC DEP EGBP/VA/VN which may join  SIRIC1G STAR at NIGIT (RNAV1) or the GWC1G STAR at GWC (RNAV5)
     TFC DEP MIDLANDS_GROUP, EGBG/BK may join the KIDLI1G STAR at MID
TFC DEP EGKB/MC/LC/TO which may join the KONAN2G at LARCK
   EGSC/SS: When using a EGSC/SS STAR the use of the STAR initial waypoint is mandatory except for:
    TFC DEP EGBE/BW via WEZKO which may join the SILVA1L at BOMBO 
TFC DEP EGLC may join the DET2A at LOFFO.
EGGW: When using a EGGW STAR the use of the STAR initial waypoint is mandatory except for:
    TFC using the DET2A may join the STAR at LOFFO
   EGBB/BE: When using a EGBB/BE STAR the use of the STAR initial waypoint is mandatory except for
   TFC DEP EGGP/NR which may join the WAL1B STAR at CREWE
   TFC via WAL not above FL085 in EG which may join the WAL1B STAR at CREWE
   TFC DEP EGSH (above FL155)/ SS/WU which may join the HEMEL1B at BUZAD
   TFC via night direct AVANT DCT CPT or DEP EGBG/BJ/BK/BP/NE/NX/SH (BLW FL155)/TC/TK/VN which may join the HEMEL1B STAR at HON
   TFC DEP EGGW/LC/LL/SC which may join the HEMEL1B STAR at WELIN
   TFC via night direct RAPIX/GALSO DCT WELIN which may join the HEMEL1B STAR at WELIN
EGKB/LC: When using a EGKB/LC STAR the use of the STAR initial waypoint is mandatory except for
     DEP EGGW/MC/SC/SH/SS/WU may join the SUMUM1C STAR at LOGAN
   TFC Via SITET may join the  NEVIL1C STAR at NETVU
   DEP EGBE / BW may join the  SILVA1C STAR at BOMBO
   DEP EGBG/BK/NX and TFC with RFL BLW FL075 may join the HON1C STAR at TIXEX
   DEP FARNBOROUGH_GROUP, EGHO/HR may join the SAM1C STAR at EVEXU
   DEP EGKA may join the SAM1C STAR at SOXUX
   DEP EGKK / LL / LC / KB / MC may join the AVANT1C at GODLU
TFC via LAKEY DCT MAMUL DCT MOGLI DCT ODVOD may join the LISTO STAR at ODVOD
EGHH/HI: When using a EGHI/HH STAR the use of the STAR initial waypoint is mandatory except for:
   DEP EGKB/LC/MC/TO or via KONAN/RINTI which may join the ELDAX1S at NOTGI   
   DEP HO/HQ/KK/LL/SH/TE/TK/WU/FARNBOROUGH_GROUP or traffic via GIBSO which may file SAM DCT EGHI or BIA DCT EGHH
EGPH: When using a EGPH STAR the use of  STAR initial waypoint is mandatory except for:
   TFC via TRN which may join the TUNSO1E STAR at TLA
   EGPF: When using a EGPF STAR the use of  STAR initial waypoint is mandatory except for:
   TFC via SAB DCT TLA which may join the AGPED1G STAR at TLA
EGMC: When using a EGMC STAR the use of  STAR initial waypoint is mandatory except for:
   DEP EGGW/SC/SH/SS/TB/WU which may join the SUMUM1S STAR at LOGAN
   Traffic via RINTI may join SOVAT1S STAR at ATSAP
   TFC via SITET may join NEVIL1S STAR at NETVU
   DEP EGHO/HR, FARNBOROUGH_GROUP which may join the SAM1S STAR at EVEXU
   DEP EGKA which may join the SAM1S STAR at SOXUX
   DEP EGBE / BW which may join the  SILVA1S STAR at BOMBO
EGNX: When using a EGNX STAR the use of the STAR initial waypoint is mandatory exc for:
   TFC via AVANT DCT VELAG which may join the HEMEL1E STAR at VELAG
   TFC DEP EGGW/EGKB/EGKK/EGLC/EGLL/EGMC/EGMD/EGSC/EGSS/EGTO/EGWU which may join the HEMEL1E STAR at WELIN
   TFC via GALSO/RAPIX DCT WELIN which may join the HEMEL1E STAR at WELIN
   TFC via SUMUM (below FL155)/SOVAT/RINTI which may join the HEMEL1E STAR at WELIN
   DEP EGNR which may join the WAL2E STAR at  NUGRA (RNAV1) or route via ROKUP DCT EGNX (RNAV5)
TFC DEP EGCN may join the LIBSO1E STAR at DESIG (RNAV1) or route via ROKUP DCT EGNX (RNAV5)
TFC DEP EGLL with ARR EGKK may join the KIDLI1G at MID
